definition: 12th earthly branch: 9-11 p.m., 10th solar month (7th November-6th December), year of the Boar/ancient Chinese compass point: 330°

sentences.english: Objective To investigate a new method of genioplasty for treatment of a prominent mandibular angle with mandibular malformation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索治疗下颌角肥大伴颏畸形时隆颏的新方法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate a new method of genioplasty for treatment of a prominent mandibular angle with mandibular malformation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索治疗下颌角肥大伴颏畸形时隆颏的新方法。

sentences.english: Structures around the nerve was not seen damaged.
sentences.chinese: 局部注射区软组织及颏孔周围骨质未见坏死。

sentences.english: Hyoid bone and arytenoid cartilages were resected and cricoid cartilage anastomosis with the base of the tongue and submental muscles.
sentences.chinese: 常规切除舌骨将环状软骨与舌根及颏下肌肉吻合。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical effect of submental island flap.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价颏下岛状皮瓣的临床应用效果。

sentences.english: She has only a small cut on her chin.
sentences.chinese: 她在颏部只有一个小伤口。

sentences.english: The standard of beautiful woman in Tang Dynasty, the double chins and bucket waist.
sentences.chinese: 那个年代的审美标准，双下颏，水桶腰。

sentences.english: Objective To apply submental area insular musculocutaneous skin valve to stage 1 restoration jaw caved defect.
sentences.chinese: 目的应用颏下区岛状肌皮瓣一期修复颊部洞穿性缺损。

sentences.english: Massage will help to tone up loose skin under the chin.
sentences.chinese: 按摩有助于使颏下松弛的皮肤柔韧起来。

sentences.english: The mandibular nerve does not end in the mental nerve, but extends to the midline in the mandibular canal.
sentences.chinese: 下颌神经并非仅终于颏神经，尚有管内段延伸至中线。

sentences.english: He gashed his chin badly when shaving.
Objective To explore a new method for mentoplasty.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨颏部美容术的一种新方法。

sentences.english: Her coral lips, her snow-white dimpled chin.
sentences.chinese: 那红似珊瑚的唇吻，雪白而含涡的下颏。

sentences.english: The largest distortion was at mental and mandible foramen regions at standard positon.
sentences.chinese: 在基准位置下，颏孔及下颌孔部的变形失真率最大。
